item.title: How do i make items spawn?
item.dc:creator: @P3rscape P3rscape
item.description:
@P3rscape wrote:

go to itemspawnpoints and youll see stuff like [code]import java.io.*;
public class itemspawnpoints
{
public int spawntimer = 0;

public void LoadItems()
{
for (int i = 0; i <= 5000; i++){
if(spawntimer <= 1)[/code]
now below the { add one of these:

ItemHandler.addItem(1050,2734, 3474, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // Santa hat 1050 is the code for santa hat, 2734 and 3474 are X & Y coords, 1 is how much there will be.
Hope this helped
